body:
Hi,


Thank you Greg,


I was wondering that was referring to a changed command.
(like rview.....). Sorry for that ...  :-(




BTW, I'd like to say thanks to all people here for this amazing and very
kind team of experts in a fantastic software like RADIANCE.
And thank you specially for your great job!


Regards from Brazil,


Vangelis


PS: I'm an architect, I was born in Greece and living in Brazil for a long
time. 
I'm writing my PHD thesis about Real-time interactive visualization of
Global illumination in the process of building design. 
And I'd appreciate to talk about it if anyone else wants to go over the
theme.
